creator: Eternal Studio
descriptionHtml:
Get ready to go on a satisfying adventure tearing down all sorts of buildings in a SUPER SATISFYING way!

You’ll need to run your own construction company and take your bulldozer around town tearing down the buildings! Make sure that you do not forget to spend your hard-earned cash on upgrading all your equipment to be efficient as possible! Take your time and relax as you take your dozer around town or see if you can deconstruct all of the buildings as fast as possible!

- Unlock tons of cool bulldozer upgrades!
- Work your way through multiple cities as you build your business
- Realistic graphics and satisfying teardown physics

Can’t wait to hear how you enjoy Dozer Demolish!
descriptionShort: Prepare to demolish and clean up the city!
title: Dozer Demolish

descriptionShort: Prepare to demolish and clean up the city!
title: Dozer Demolish

creator: Homa
descriptionHtml:
Dozer Demolish - building destruction game is your new favorite destruction simulator where you get to destroy buildings with your bulldozer and do a city smash!

Get ready to go on a satisfying adventure to teardown all sorts of buildings in a SUPER SATISFYING way! This is not one of the usual destruction games where you just take the wrecking ball and do a city smash! This is the destruction simulator we have all been waiting for!

You’ll need to run your own construction company and take your bulldozer around town and teardown and destroy buildings! Make sure that you do not forget to spend your hard-earned cash on upgrading all your equipment to be efficient as possible in this building destruction game! Take your time and relax as you take your dozer around town for demolition or see if you can deconstruct all of the buildings in one of the most addicting destroying games!

- Unlock tons of cool bulldozer upgrades for better building destruction!
- Work your way through multiple cities as you build your business when you teardown and destroy buildings
- Realistic graphics and satisfying teardown destruction simulator
- Rope and demolish with your happy dozer machine just like bucket crusher
- Do a city demolish like in disassembly 3d and other cool destroying games
- Demolition and tear down with your bulldozer to every building that will come on your way

Can’t wait to tear down and do city smash while enjoying Dozer Demolish - one of the best destruction games!
descriptionShort: Destroy buildings, tear down cities in this building destruction simulator game!
title: Dozer Demolish: City Tear Down
